Method.name: ExecuteScript
Method.Implementation: set command = ^settings("exec") _ " \\" _ ..Machine.IP _ " -u " _..Username _ " -p " _ ..Password _ " -accepteula -i -s -c -f " _ Filename w command,! set st = $zf(-1,command) Quit st

Method.name: CreateTestScript
Method.Implementation: set script = ##class(RCE.Script).%New() do script.Insert(##class(RCE.Command).%New("cd \",0)) do script.Insert(##class(RCE.Command).%New("echo start %date% - %time% >> date.txt",0)) do script.Insert(##class(RCE.Command).%New("set ^test=1",1)) do script.Insert(##class(RCE.Command).%New("set ^test(1)=$zdt($NOW())",1)) do script.Insert(##class(RCE.Command).%New("echo end %date% - %time% >> date.txt",0)) return script
